parameters.name: workspaces
parameters.label: Workspaces
parameters.query:
where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| where strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId) in ({subscription})
| project id

parameters.name: clustername
parameters.label: Cluster name
parameters.query:
where type == "microsoft.containerservice/managedclusters"
| where strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId) in ({subscription})
| distinct tolower(id)

parameters.name: nodeRgDetails
parameters.query:
where type == "microsoft.containerservice/managedclusters"
| where tolower(id) in ({clustername})
| project nodeRG = properties.nodeResourceGroup, subscriptionId, id = toupper(id)
| project nodeRgDetails = strcat('"', nodeRG, ";", subscriptionId, ";", id, '"')

parameters.name: diagnosticClusters
parameters.query:
union withsource=_TableName *
| where _TableName == "AzureDiagnostics" and Category == "kube-audit"
| summarize diagnosticClusters = dcount(ResourceId)
| project isDiagnosticCluster = iff(diagnosticClusters > 0, "yes", "no")

content.query:
datatable (Event:string)
    ["AKS Workbook"]
| extend cluster = (strcat("[", "{clustername}", "]"))
| extend cluster = todynamic(replace("'", '"', cluster))
| mvexpand cluster
| extend subscriptionId = extract(@"/subscriptions/([^/]+)", 1, tostring(cluster))
| summarize AksClusters = count() by subscriptionId, DefenderForAks = 0
| union
(
securityresources
| where type =~ "microsoft.security/pricings"
| where name == "KubernetesService"
| project DefenderForAks = iif(properties.pricingTier == 'Standard', 1, 0), AksClusters = 0, subscriptionId
)
| summarize AksClusters = sum(AksClusters), DefenderForAks = sum(DefenderForAks) by subscriptionId
| project Subscription = strcat('/subscriptions/', subscriptionId), ["AKS clusters"] = AksClusters, ['Defender for AKS'] = iif(DefenderForAks > 0,'yes','no'), ['Onboard Azure Defender'] = iif(DefenderForAks > 0, '', 'https://ms.portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_Azure_Security/SecurityMenuBlade/26')
| order by ['Defender for AKS'] asc

datatable (Event:string)
    ["AKS Workbook"]
| extend cluster = (strcat("[", "{clustername}", "]"))
| extend cluster = todynamic(replace("'", '"', cluster))
| mvexpand cluster
| extend subscriptionId = extract(@"/subscriptions/([^/]+)", 1, tostring(cluster))
| summarize AksClusters = count() by subscriptionId, DefenderForAks = 0
| union
(
securityresources
| where type =~ "microsoft.security/pricings"
| where name == "KubernetesService"
| project DefenderForAks = iif(properties.pricingTier == 'Standard', 1, 0), AksClusters = 0, subscriptionId
)
| summarize AksClusters = sum(AksClusters), DefenderForAks = sum(DefenderForAks) by subscriptionId
| project Subscription = 1, ['Defender for AKS'] = iif(DefenderForAks > 0,'Protected by Azure Defender','Not protected by Azure Defender')

SecurityAlert 
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({clustername})
| where TimeGenerated {timeframe}
| where AlertType startswith "AKS_"
| project image = tostring(todynamic(ExtendedProperties)["Container image"]), AlertType
| where image != ""
| summarize AlertTypes = dcount(AlertType) by image
| where AlertTypes > 1
//| render piechart
content.title: Images with multiple alerts

content.query:
SecurityAlert 
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({clustername})
| where TimeGenerated {timeframe}
| where AlertType startswith "AKS_"
| project AlertType, name = extract(@"/MICROSOFT.CONTAINERSERVICE/MANAGEDCLUSTERS/(.+)", 1, ResourceId)
| summarize AlertTypes = dcount(AlertType)  by  name
| where AlertTypes > 1
content.title: Clusters with multiple alert types

content.query:
SecurityAlert 
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({clustername})
| where TimeGenerated {timeframe}
| where AlertType startswith "AKS_"
| project AlertType, name = extract(@"/MICROSOFT.CONTAINERSERVICE/MANAGEDCLUSTERS/(.+)", 1, ResourceId)
| summarize count() by name
content.title: Alerts triggered by cluster

content.json:
### Seucirty alerts details

To filter, press on the severities below.
You can also filter based on a specific resource.

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated {timeframe}
| extend rg = extract(@"/resourcegroups/([^/]+)", 1, tolower(ResourceId))
| extend sub = extract(@"/subscriptions/([^/]+)", 1, tolower(ResourceId))
| extend nodesDetailsArr = todynamic('{nodeRgDetails}')
| mv-expand singleNodeDetails = nodesDetailsArr
| extend singleNodeArr = split(singleNodeDetails, ";")
| where tolower(singleNodeArr[0]) == rg and tolower(singleNodeArr[1]) == sub
| project AlertSeverity
| union
(
SecurityAlert 
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({clustername})
| where TimeGenerated {timeframe}
| where AlertType startswith "AKS_"
| project AlertSeverity
)
| summarize count() by AlertSeverity
content.title: Alerts by severity

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated {timeframe}
| where "{severity}" has AlertSeverity or isempty("{severity}")
| extend rg = extract(@"/resourcegroups/([^/]+)", 1, tolower(ResourceId))
| extend sub = extract(@"/subscriptions/([^/]+)", 1, tolower(ResourceId))
| extend nodesDetailsArr = todynamic('{nodeRgDetails}')
| mv-expand singleNodeDetails = nodesDetailsArr
| extend singleNodeArr = split(singleNodeDetails, ";")
| where tolower(singleNodeArr[0]) == rg and tolower(singleNodeArr[1]) == sub
| project ResourceId
| union
(
SecurityAlert 
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({clustername})
| where "{severity}" has AlertSeverity or isempty("{severity}")
| where TimeGenerated {timeframe}
| where AlertType startswith "AKS_"
| project ResourceId
)
| summarize Alerts = count() by ResourceId
| order by Alerts desc
| limit 10
content.title: Resources with most alerts

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated {timeframe}
| where "{severity}" has AlertSeverity or isempty("{severity}")
| extend rg = extract(@"/resourcegroups/([^/]+)", 1, tolower(ResourceId))
| extend sub = extract(@"/subscriptions/([^/]+)", 1, tolower(ResourceId))
| extend nodesDetailsArr = todynamic('{nodeRgDetails}')
| mv-expand singleNodeDetails = nodesDetailsArr
| extend singleNodeArr = split(singleNodeDetails, ";")
| where tolower(singleNodeArr[0]) == rg and tolower(singleNodeArr[1]) == sub
| extend AlertResourceType = "VM alerts"
| union
(
SecurityAlert 
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({clustername})
| where "{severity}" has AlertSeverity or isempty("{severity}")
| where TimeGenerated {timeframe}
| where AlertType startswith "AKS_"
| extend AlertResourceType = "Cluster alerts"
)
| summarize Alerts = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, {timeframe:grain}), AlertResourceType
content.title: Alerts over time

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated {timeframe}
| where "{severity}" has AlertSeverity or isempty("{severity}")
| extend rg = extract(@"/resourcegroups/([^/]+)", 1, tolower(ResourceId))
| extend sub = extract(@"/subscriptions/([^/]+)", 1, tolower(ResourceId))
| extend nodesDetailsArr = todynamic('{nodeRgDetails}')
| mv-expand singleNodeDetails = nodesDetailsArr
| extend singleNodeArr = split(singleNodeDetails, ";")
| where tolower(singleNodeArr[0]) == rg and tolower(singleNodeArr[1]) == sub
| where tolower(ResourceId) == tolower("{selectedResource}") or "{selectedResource}" == "not_selected"
| project ["Resource name"] = ResourceId, TimeGenerated, AlertSeverity, ["AKS cluster"] = toupper(singleNodeArr[2]), DisplayName, AlertLink
| union
(
SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated {timeframe}
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({clustername})
| where "{severity}" has AlertSeverity or isempty("{severity}")
| where AlertType startswith "AKS_"
| where tolower(ResourceId) == tolower("{selectedResource}") or "{selectedResource}" == "not_selected"
| project ["Resource name"] = ResourceId, TimeGenerated, AlertSeverity, ["AKS cluster"] = ResourceId, DisplayName, AlertLink
)
| order by TimeGenerated asc
content.title: Azure Defender alerts

content.query:
union withsource=_TableName *
| where _TableName == "AzureDiagnostics" and Category == "kube-audit"
| summarize count() by ResourceId = tolower(ResourceId)
| summarize logsClusters = make_set(ResourceId)
| extend selectedClusters = "[{clustername}]"
| extend selectedClusters = replace("'", '"', selectedClusters)
| extend selectedClusters = todynamic(selectedClusters)
| mv-expand clusterId = selectedClusters
| project clusterId = toupper(tostring(clusterId)), ["Diagnostic logs"] = (logsClusters has tostring(clusterId))
| extend ["Diagnostic settings"] = iff(["Diagnostic logs"] == false, strcat("https://ms.portal.azure.com/#@microsoft.onmicrosoft.com/resource", clusterId, "/diagnostics"), "")

union withsource=_TableName *
| where _TableName == "AzureDiagnostics" and Category == "kube-audit"
| summarize count() by ResourceId = tolower(ResourceId)
| summarize logsClusters = make_set(ResourceId)
| extend selectedClusters = "[{clustername}]"
| extend selectedClusters = replace("'", '"', selectedClusters)
| extend selectedClusters = todynamic(selectedClusters)
| mv-expand clusterId = selectedClusters
| project clusterId = toupper(tostring(clusterId)), hasDiagnosticLogs = (logsClusters has tostring(clusterId))
| summarize ["number of clusters"] = count() by hasDiagnosticLogs
| extend hasDiagnosticLogs = iff(hasDiagnosticLogs == true, "Clusters with Diagnostic logs", "Clusters without Diagnostic logs")

AzureDiagnostics 
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({clustername})
| where TimeGenerated {timeframe}
| where Category == "kube-audit"
| where log_s has "masterclient"
| project TimeGenerated, parse_json(log_s), ResourceId
| project TimeGenerated, ResourceId, username = tostring(log_s["user"].username)
| where username == "masterclient"
| extend name = extract(@"/MICROSOFT.CONTAINERSERVICE/MANAGEDCLUSTERS/(.+)", 1, ResourceId)
| summarize count() by name, bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)

AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == "kube-audit"
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({clustername})
| where TimeGenerated {timeframe}
| where log_s has "pods"
| project TimeGenerated, parse_json(log_s), ResourceId
| project AzureResourceId = ResourceId, TimeGenerated,
 RequestURI = tostring(log_s["requestURI"]),
 Verb = tostring(log_s["verb"]),
 ObjectRef = log_s["objectRef"],
 ResponseStatus = log_s["responseStatus"]
//Main query
| where ObjectRef.resource == "pods" and Verb == "create" and ResponseStatus.code startswith "20"
  and ObjectRef !has "subresource"
| extend name = extract(@"/MICROSOFT.CONTAINERSERVICE/MANAGEDCLUSTERS/(.+)", 1, AzureResourceId)
| summarize count() by name, bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)

AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == "kube-audit"
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({clustername})
| where TimeGenerated {timeframe}
| where log_s has "secrets"
| project TimeGenerated, parse_json(log_s), ResourceId
| project AzureResourceId = ResourceId, TimeGenerated,
 RequestURI = tostring(log_s["requestURI"]),
 Verb = tostring(log_s["verb"]),
 ObjectRef = log_s["objectRef"],
 ResponseStatus = log_s["responseStatus"]
//Main query
| where ObjectRef.resource == "secrets" and (Verb == "list" or Verb == "get") and ResponseStatus.code startswith "20"
| where ObjectRef.name != "tunnelfront" and ObjectRef.name != "tunnelend" and ObjectRef.name != "kubernetes-dashboard-key-holder"
| extend name = extract(@"/MICROSOFT.CONTAINERSERVICE/MANAGEDCLUSTERS/(.+)", 1, AzureResourceId)
| summarize count() by name, bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)

let ascAlerts = 
union withsource=_TableName *
| where _TableName == "SecurityAlert"
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({clustername})
| where TimeGenerated {timeframe}
| extend AlertType = column_ifexists("AlertType", "")
| where AlertType == "AKS_PrivilegedContainer"
| extend ExtendedProperties = column_ifexists("ExtendedProperties", todynamic(""))
| extend ExtendedProperties = parse_json(ExtendedProperties)
| extend AlertLink = column_ifexists("AlertLink", "")
| summarize arg_min(TimeGenerated, AlertLink) by AzureResourceId = ResourceId, name = tostring(ExtendedProperties["Pod name"]), podNamespace =  tostring(ExtendedProperties["Namespace"])
;
let podOperations = AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == "kube-audit"
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({clustername})
| where TimeGenerated {timeframe}
| where log_s has "privileged"
| project TimeGenerated, parse_json(log_s), ResourceId
| project AzureResourceId = ResourceId, TimeGenerated,
 RequestURI = tostring(log_s["requestURI"]),
 Verb = tostring(log_s["verb"]),
 ObjectRef = log_s["objectRef"],
 RequestObject = log_s["requestObject"],
 ResponseStatus = log_s["responseStatus"],
 ResponseObject = log_s["responseObject"]
//Main query
| where ObjectRef.resource == "pods" and Verb == "create" and ResponseStatus.code startswith "20" and RequestObject has "privileged"
  and ObjectRef !has "subresource"
| extend containers = RequestObject.spec.containers
| mvexpand containers
| where containers.securityContext.privileged == true
| summarize TimeGenerated = min(TimeGenerated) by
            name = tostring(ResponseObject.metadata.name),
            podNamespace = tostring(ResponseObject.metadata.namespace),
            imageName = tostring(containers.image),
            containerName = tostring(containers.name),
            AzureResourceId
| extend id = strcat(name,";", AzureResourceId)
| extend parent = AzureResourceId
| join kind=leftouter (ascAlerts) on AzureResourceId, name, podNamespace
;
let cached = materialize(podOperations)
;
let clusters = cached | distinct AzureResourceId
;
// Main query
cached
| union
(
clusters
| project 
            name = AzureResourceId,
            id = AzureResourceId,
            parent = ""      
)
| project-away name1, podNamespace1, TimeGenerated1
content.title: Privileged containers creation

content.query:
SecurityAlert 
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({clustername})
| where TimeGenerated {timeframe}
| where AlertType == "AKS_PrivilegedContainer"
| project name = extract(@"/MICROSOFT.CONTAINERSERVICE/MANAGEDCLUSTERS/(.+)", 1, ResourceId)
| summarize alert = count() by name
content.title: AKS clusters with related Azure Defender alerts

content.query:
let baseQuery = AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category == "kube-audit"
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({clustername})
| where TimeGenerated {timeframe}
| where log_s has "exec"
| project TimeGenerated, parse_json(log_s), ResourceId
| project TimeGenerated,
          AzureResourceId = ResourceId,
          User = log_s["user"],
          StageTimestamp = todatetime(log_s["stageTimestamp"]),
          Timestamp = todatetime(log_s["timestamp"]),
          Stage = tostring(log_s["stage"]),
          RequestURI = tostring(log_s["requestURI"]),
          UserAgent = tostring(log_s["userAgent"]),
          Verb = tostring(log_s["verb"]),
          ObjectRef = log_s["objectRef"],
          ResponseStatus = log_s["responseStatus"]
| where ObjectRef.resource == "pods" and Verb == "create" and ResponseStatus.code == 101 and ObjectRef.subresource == "exec"
| project operationTime = TimeGenerated,
          RequestURI,
          podName       = tostring(ObjectRef.name),
          podNamespace  = tostring(ObjectRef.namespace),
          username      = tostring(User.username),
          AzureResourceId
// Parse the exec command
| extend commands =  extractall(@"command=([^\&]*)", RequestURI)
| extend commandsStr = url_decode(strcat_array(commands, " "))
| project-away ['commands'], RequestURI
| where username != "aksProblemDetector"
;
let cached = materialize(baseQuery);
let execOperations = 
cached
| summarize operationTime = min(operationTime), numberOfPerations = count() by name = commandsStr, username, podNamespace, podName, AzureResourceId
| extend id = name
| extend parentId = podName
| project id, parentId, name, operationTime, numberOfPerations, podNamespace, username, AzureResourceId
;
let podOperations = 
cached
| summarize operationTime = min(operationTime), numberOfPerations = count() by name = podName, podNamespace, AzureResourceId
| extend id = name
| extend parentId = AzureResourceId
| project id, parentId, name, operationTime, numberOfPerations, podNamespace, username = "", AzureResourceId
;
let clusterOperations = 
cached
| summarize operationTime = min(operationTime), numberOfPerations = count() by name = AzureResourceId
| extend id = name
| extend parentId = ""
| project id, parentId, name, operationTime, numberOfPerations, username = "", podNamespace = "", AzureResourceId = name
;
union clusterOperations, podOperations, execOperations
content.title: exec commands

content.query:
SecurityAlert 
| where AlertType == "AKS_MaliciousContainerExec"
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({clustername})
| where TimeGenerated {timeframe}
| project TimeGenerated, ResourceId, ExtendedProperties = todynamic(ExtendedProperties)
| project TimeGenerated, ResourceId, ["Pod name"] = ExtendedProperties["Pod name"], Command = ExtendedProperties["Command"]
content.title: Related Azure Defender alerts details

content.query:
SecurityAlert 
| where AlertType == "AKS_MaliciousContainerExec"
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({clustername})
| where TimeGenerated {timeframe}
| project name = extract(@"/MICROSOFT.CONTAINERSERVICE/MANAGEDCLUSTERS/(.+)", 1, ResourceId)
| summarize alert = count() by name
content.title: AKS clusters with related Azure Defender alerts

content.query:
let ascAlerts = 
union withsource=_TableName *
| where _TableName == "SecurityAlert"
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({clustername})
| where TimeGenerated {timeframe}
| extend AlertType = column_ifexists("AlertType", "")
| where AlertType == "AKS_SensitiveMount"
| extend ExtendedProperties = column_ifexists("ExtendedProperties", todynamic(""))
| extend ExtendedProperties = parse_json(ExtendedProperties)
| extend AlertLink = column_ifexists("AlertLink", "")
| summarize arg_min(TimeGenerated, AlertLink) by AzureResourceId = ResourceId, containerName = tostring(ExtendedProperties["Container name"]), mountPath = tostring(ExtendedProperties["Sensitive mount path"])
;
let podOperations = 
AzureDiagnostics 
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({clustername})
| where TimeGenerated {timeframe}
| where Category == "kube-audit"
| where log_s has "hostPath"
| project TimeGenerated, parse_json(log_s), ResourceId
//Parsing
| project AzureResourceId = ResourceId, TimeGenerated,
 Verb = tostring(log_s["verb"]),
 ObjectRef = log_s["objectRef"],
 RequestObject = log_s["requestObject"],
 ResponseStatus = log_s["responseStatus"],
 ResponseObject = log_s["responseObject"]
//
//Main query
//
| where ObjectRef.resource == "pods" and Verb == "create" and ResponseStatus.code startswith "20" and RequestObject has "hostPath"
| extend volumes = RequestObject.spec.volumes
| mvexpand volumes
| extend mountPath = volumes.hostPath.path
| where mountPath != "" 
| extend container = RequestObject.spec.containers
| mvexpand container
| extend  detectionTime = TimeGenerated
| project detectionTime,
          podName = ResponseObject.metadata.name,
          podNamespace = ResponseObject.metadata.namespace,
          containerName = container.name,
          containerImage = container.image,
          mountPath,
          mountName = volumes.name,
          AzureResourceId,
          container
| extend volumeMounts = container.volumeMounts
| mv-expand volumeMounts
| where tostring(volumeMounts.name) == tostring(mountName)
| summarize operationTime = min(detectionTime) by AzureResourceId, name = tostring(podName),tostring(podNamespace), tostring(containerName), tostring(containerImage), tostring(mountPath), tostring(mountName)
| extend id = strcat(name, ";", AzureResourceId)
| extend parent = AzureResourceId
| join kind=leftouter (ascAlerts) on AzureResourceId, containerName, mountPath
;
let cached = materialize(podOperations)
;
let clusters = cached | distinct AzureResourceId
;
// Main query
cached
| union
(
clusters
| project 
            name = toupper(AzureResourceId),
            id = AzureResourceId,
            parent = ""      
)
| project-away containerName1, mountPath1, TimeGenerated
content.title: hostPath mount

content.query:
SecurityAlert 
| where AlertType == "AKS_SensitiveMount"
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({clustername})
| where TimeGenerated {timeframe}
| project name = extract(@"/MICROSOFT.CONTAINERSERVICE/MANAGEDCLUSTERS/(.+)", 1, ResourceId)
| summarize alert = count() by name
content.title: AKS clusters with related Azure Defender alerts

content.query:
let bindingOper = AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == "kube-audit"
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({clustername})
| where TimeGenerated {timeframe}
| where log_s has "clusterrolebindings"
| project TimeGenerated, parse_json(log_s), ResourceId
//Parsing
| project AzureResourceId = ResourceId, TimeGenerated,
 RequestURI = tostring(log_s["requestURI"]),
 User = log_s["user"],
 Verb = tostring(log_s["verb"]),
 ObjectRef = log_s["objectRef"],
 RequestObject = log_s["requestObject"],
 ResponseStatus = log_s["responseStatus"]
| where ObjectRef.resource == "clusterrolebindings" and Verb == "create" and ResponseStatus.code startswith "20" and RequestObject.roleRef.name == "cluster-admin"   
| extend subjects = RequestObject.subjects
| mv-expand subjects
| project AzureResourceId, TimeGenerated, subjectName = tostring(subjects.name), subjectKind = tostring(subjects["kind"]), bindingName = tostring(ObjectRef.name)
| summarize operationTime = min(TimeGenerated) by AzureResourceId, subjectName, subjectKind, bindingName
| extend id = strcat(subjectName, ";", AzureResourceId)
| extend parent = AzureResourceId
;
let cached = materialize(bindingOper)
;
let clusters = cached | distinct AzureResourceId
;
// Main query
cached
| union
(
clusters
| project 
            name = AzureResourceId,
            id = AzureResourceId,
            parent = ""      
)
content.title: Cluster-admin binding

content.query:
SecurityAlert 
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({clustername})
| where TimeGenerated {timeframe}
| where AlertType == "AKS_ClusterAdminBinding"
| project name = extract(@"/MICROSOFT.CONTAINERSERVICE/MANAGEDCLUSTERS/(.+)", 1, ResourceId)
| summarize count() by name
content.title: AKS clusters with related Azure Defender alerts

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == "kube-audit"
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({clustername})
| where TimeGenerated {timeframe}
| where log_s has "events"
| project TimeGenerated, parse_json(log_s), ResourceId
//Parsing
| project AzureResourceId = ResourceId, 
 TimeGenerated,
 SourceIPs = tostring(log_s["sourceIPs"][0]),
 User = log_s["user"],
 Verb = tostring(log_s["verb"]),
 ObjectRef = log_s["objectRef"],
 ResponseStatus = log_s["responseStatus"]
| where ObjectRef.resource == "events" and Verb == "delete" and ResponseStatus.code == 200
| project TimeGenerated, AzureResourceId, username = tostring(User.username), ipAddr = tostring(SourceIPs), 
          eventName = tostring(ObjectRef.name), eventNamespace = tostring(ObjectRef.namespace), status = tostring(ResponseStatus.code)
| summarize operationTime = min(TimeGenerated), eventNames = make_set(eventName, 10) by
                                        AzureResourceId, 
                                        eventNamespace,
                                        username,
                                        ipAddr
// Format the list of the event names
| extend eventNames = substring(eventNames, 1 , strlen(eventNames) - 2)
| extend eventNames = replace('"', "", eventNames)
| extend eventNames = replace(",", ", ", eventNames)
content.title: Delete events

content.json:
No Diagnostic Logs data in the selected workspaces. 
To enable Diagnostic Logs for your AKS cluster: Go to your AKS cluster --> Diagnostic settings --> Add diagnostic setting --> Select "kube-audit" and send the data to your workspace.

Get more details here: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/aks/view-master-logs
